taxonomy.desc: UD syntactic relations: All defined syntactic relations of the Universal Dependendencies project

category.catDesc: acl: clausal modifier of noun (adnominal clause)
acl:subj: clausal modifier of noun (adnominal clause): the noun is the subject
acl:tmod: clausal modifier of noun of time (adnominal clause)
advcl:cmp: comparative adverbial clause modifier of an adjective or adverb
advcl:lcl: advcl with locative to modality
advcl:lto: advcl with locative to modality
advcl:mcl: adverbial clause with modal modality
advcl:relcl: relative clause modifier of the clause
advmod:adj: adverbial modifier is an adjective
advmod:cmp: comparative modifier of an adjective or adverb
advmod:det: adverbial modification by a determiner
advmod:df: duration or frequency adverbial modifier
advmod:lfrom: advmod with source locative from modality
advmod:lmp: advmod with locative multipoint modality
advmod:lto: advmod with locative to modality
advmod:obl: contracted advmod and oblique nominal
amod:attlvc: participle in a light-verb construction
amod:flat: adjectival part of a named entity
case:adv: case marking to form adverbs
ccomp:cleft: required clausal dependent of the pronoun _to_
ccomp:relcl: double pronoun construction or free relative acting as object
ccomp:reported: reported speech from active verb of saying or digression in discursive form
compound:ext: extent and descriptive verb compound
compound:preverb: relation between verb and preverb
cop:locat: copula with a locative predicate
csubj:pred: clausal subject of a secondary predicate (enhanced dependency)
csubj:relcl: double pronoun construction or free relative acting as subject
csubj:reported: reported speech from passive verb of saying
dep:mod: modifier underspecified for the syntactic category of its head
det:adj: article of a prearticulated adjective
det:noun: article of a prearticulated noun
det:numgov: pronominal quantifier governing the case of the noun
det:nummod: pronominal quantifier agreeing in case with the noun
det:pron: article of a prearticulated pronoun
discourse:filler: filler sound in spoken data
dislocated:cleft: cleft constructions that lack a copula
dislocated:vo: dislocated object of verb-object compound
expl:pass: reflexive pronoun used in reflexive passive
expl:pv: reflexive clitic with an inherently reflexive verb
flat:redup: flat multiword expression: alliterative expressions
iobj:appl: applied indirect object in applicative construction
iobj:patient: patient object of a non-actor/patient-focused verb
mark:advmod: adverbial modifier confusable with a subordination marker
mark:pcomp: marker for the purpose clause
mark:rel: adjectival, relativizer, and nominalizer 的 DE
nmod:agent: agent of verbnouns in _cael_ constructions
nmod:arg: nominal modifier used as an argument
nmod:attlvc: object nominal in a nominalized light-verb construction
nmod:cau: nominal modifier indicating the causee of a causative predicate
nmod:comp: comparative modifier of an adjective or adverb
nmod:flat: nominal part of a named entity
nmod:lfrom: advmod with locative to modality
nmod:npmod: noun phrase as adverbial modifier
nmod:part: nominal modifier indicating part-whole relations
nmod:prp: proprietive modifier of a noun
nsubj:advmod: fused subject pronoun and adverb
nsubj:bfoc: nominal subject of a beneficiary-focused verb
nsubj:cleft: nominal residual subject of a cleft sentence
nsubj:ifoc: nominal subject of an instrumental-focused verb
nsubj:lfoc: nominal subject of a locative-focused verb
nsubj:lvc: subject in a light-verb construction
nsubj:nn: nominal subject: the predicate is noun
nsubj:obj: fused subject and object pronoun
nsubj:pred: subject of a secondary predicate (enhanced dependency)
nsubj:xsubj: The subject xcomp is the complement
nummod:entity: numeric modifier governed by a noun
nummod:flat: numeral part of a named entity
nummod:gov: numeric modifier governing the case of the noun
obj:advmod: fused adverb and object pronoun
obj:advneg: fused negation and object pronoun
obj:appl: applied object in applicative construction
obj:cau: direct object of an intransitive causative verb
obj:caus: agentive object in causative construction
obj:lvc: object in a light-verb construction
obj:obl: fused oblique and object pronoun
obl:adj: oblique nominal: Auxiliary nouns for adjectives
obl:advmod: adverbial modifier confusable with an oblique dependent
obl:appl: applied oblique argument in non-canonical applicative construction
obl:cmp: standard-of-comparison modifier of an adjective or adverb
obl:comp: oblique nominal with other preposition
obl:iobj: oblique nominal for verb means "to give"
obl:lfrom: obl with source locative from modality
obl:lmp: obl with locative to modality
obl:lto: obl with locative to modality
obl:lvc: oblique nominal in a light-verb construction
obl:npmod: noun phrase as adverbial modifier
obl:orphan: adpositional dependent with the elided noun
obl:own: owner in possessive existential clauses
obl:with: oblique nominal to answer "with whom"
orphan:missing: textual gap in the source
parataxis:deletion: loosely connected clause because of deletion
parataxis:newsent: new sentence attached to a node in the previous sentence
parataxis:restart: loosely connected clause because of restart
xcomp:adj: open clausal complement for adjective
xcomp:cleft: required open dependent of the pronoun _to_
xcomp:dir: open clausal complement for adjective
xcomp:ds: clausal complement with different subject
xcomp:relcl: double pronoun construction or free relative acting as complement clause
xcomp:vcomp: open clausal complement for adjective
